item.title: Report X-2024020312
item.description:
Report X-2024020312

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-12
  • City: NORTH SALT LAKE
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found upright and wet on one side. There were orientation arrows, but no hazmat markings on the outer package. Package contained 4 gallon bottles of corrosive liquid, one of which had leaked throughout the package and coated the rest of the contents in the liquid. The bottle that was opened had leaked most of it's contents. The liquid had spilled out of the outer container on to the dock. The package was placed in a hazmat tote and the spill was cleaned with absorb. DescribePack: Package was upright, but wet on one side. One of the inner bottles had a loose cap and had lost most of it's contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was quickly moved from main dock area after discovering it was a hazmat spill. spill was cleaned up with absorb and package was placed into a lined red hazmat tote.

DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED INSIDE A PLASTIC HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE
